lead_paragraph: Manager Juergen Klopp blamed Liverpool's poor injury record for their position in the Premier League table after watching his team draw 1-1 with Tottenham Hotspur at Anfield on Saturday.

headline.print_headline: Injury Leads to Mediocrity, Admits Liverpool Boss Klopp
headline.main: Injury Leads to Mediocrity, Admits Liverpool Boss Klopp
